attributes.name: PingDirectory LDAP Connection Handler Startup Error
PingDirectory LDAP Connection Handler Consecutive Failures
PingDirectory LDAP Connection Handler Uncaught Error
PingDirectory Database Cache Full - Backend userRoot
PingDirectory Database Cache Full - Backend appintegrations

documents.sns_message:
{
    "alert": "{{rule.name}}",
    "documents": "{{context.value}}",
    "cluster": "{{context.hits.0._source.cluster_name}}",
    "timestamp": "{{context.date}}",
    "runbook": "https://pingidentity.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ST/pages/154340442/ALERT+PingDirectory+Critical+Alarm+in+CDE"
  }

params.esQuery: {"query":{"bool":{"filter":[{"range":{"@timestamp":{"gte":"now-90s","lte":"now","format":"epoch_millis"}}},{"match_phrase":{"kubernetes.container_name":"pingdirectory"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"\"alert type=alarm-critical\""}},{"wildcard":{"severity":{"wildcard":"*error*","boost":1}}},{"bool":{"must_not":{"bool":{"filter":[{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Database Cache Full"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}},{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Backend appintegrations"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}]}}}},{"bool":{"must_not":{"bool":{"filter":[{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Database Cache Full"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}},{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Backend userRoot"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}]}}}},{"bool":{"must_not":{"bool":{"filter":[{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"alert type=alarm-major"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}},{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"License Expiration"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}]}}}},{"bool":{"must_not":{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Active Cleaner Threads"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Available File Descriptors"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Changelog Database Target Size"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"CPU Usage"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Database Cache Full"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Backend appintegrations"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Backend userRoot"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Disk Busy"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"HTTP Processing"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"JVM Memory Usage"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"License Expiration"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Purge Expired Data Backlog"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Replication Purge Delay"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Undeletable Database Files"}},{"match_phrase":{"msg":"Work Queue Size"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}}}]}}}

documents.sns_message:
{
    "alert": "{{rule.name}}",
    "documents": "{{context.value}}",
    "cluster": "{{context.hits.0._source.cluster_name}}",
    "timestamp": "{{context.date}}",
    "runbook": "https://pingidentity.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ST/pages/154796033/ALERT+PingDirectory+Major+Alarm+in+CDE"
  }
